title: In My Own Words: A Life in Poetry
description: A collection of poetry that addresses some common life themes such as: love, lust, nature, life, angst. The poems contained in this anthology are both free-verse and rhyming. Many of the poems within In My Own Words will speak to the reader who has suffered the joys and sorrows of falling in love, the pain of depression and loneliness, and the joys of nature and its healing power.In My Own Words, A Life in Poetry will captivate your imagination, with accessible and understandable poems. Rarely has a book of poetry captured such raw emotion, such powerful images. Escape into a labyrinth of words designed to entertain, educate, and deeply affect you.
author: Robert M. Levasseur
